skills.skill: CAD Integration with TC – NX, SW, CATIA V5R26
Data Migration / Upgrade to Teamcenter – TC11 – TC13

duties_responsibilities.duty: Configure, administer, and support the Teamcenter PLM system to ensure efficient data and process management throughout the product lifecycle.
Manage new installs, upgrades, and patch installs, ensuring appropriate security and compliance with infrastructure architecture standards.
Effectively communicate with customers and IT teams, supporting integration of application and/or technology portfolio.
Lead special projects and management initiatives, supporting Global Teamcenter applications Change Control Management, Problem Management, Lifecycle Management, and more.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
